properties.Observatio: No tanks has been built near the spring and water is obtained using pipes. 20 families obtained water from this Spring. The source is located in the paddy field, so agrochemicals  accumulate.
properties.Descriptio:
Construction of Concrete water storage tank of 20 cum ? size internal t 3mx3mx2.5
Water treatment unit 1 m x 1 m
Contigencies (10%)

properties.Observatio: No tanks has been built near the spring and water is obtained using pipes. 15 families obtained water from this Spring.

Vegetative cover improving around structures (5m x 10m) with Areca nut seedling in 1.5m x 
1.5m grid, Kumbuk/ Mee/ Godapara/ Kaduru/ Aththikka/ Wal Del/ Kekuna/ randomly mixed 
seedlings and planting at 3.5m x 3.5 m grid interval
